section1.title: Welcome to my portfolio test page
section1.description: This site is a fully self-developed e-commerce platform designed to provide a functional environment for running and showcasing automated test scripts. In addition to simulating a real online store, it also serves as a technical portfolio to demonstrate my skills in testing, automation, and web development.
section1.mobileMessage: ⚠️ To access all the features of the site, please use a desktop device. ⚠️

section2.title: Turning ideas into automated reality, one test at a time.
section2.linkedIn: Visit my LinkedIn to learn more about my work
